sentence.Network_en: Drilling will continue on the site to assess the dimensions of the new oilfield.
sentence.Network_cn: 该处的钻探工作将继续下去，以便估测新油田的面积。

sentence.Network_en: Barium is found in some oilfield brines in concentrations greater than 100 mg / litre.
sentence.Network_cn: 在有些油田卤水中,钡的浓度大于100毫克/升.

sentence.Network_en: Highly - displacement drilling is an effective technology to exploit peripheral oilfield.
sentence.Network_cn: 摘要大位移钻井是开发边际油田的有效手段.

entry.def: An oilfield is an area of land or sea under which there is oil.

means.word_mean: 1. a region rich in petroleum deposits (especially one with producing oil wells)
